name: Skull Burn
description:
All "Magic Torches" have gone out. Now the little "Skull Burn" sets out to light it.

Features:

- Retro Style
- Pixel Graphics
- Chiptune Sound
- Unique Gameplay

Movement:

Left Arrow = Left
Right Arrow = Right
Space = Jump
Alt = Shot

This is a Prototype ..., tell me what you think of it!!!
